text: Nancy Berg (born 1931) is an American former model and actress. Nancy Berg ran away from home in Kenosha, Wisconsin in 1947 to start modelling, and by 1960, she was earning $40,000 per year; she later worked as an actress. Berg was on the front cover of Vogue four times, starting in 1953.
